name: Disco Ibiza Brujería
description:
Being an 80s Spanish popstar is fabulous: You're rich, you're famous, you got everything you want... besides NOT sharing the stage with that asshole. Fight with your magic fans and defeat your oponent. There is only place for one of you in the band!

I don't own the music nor the background. The sprites used here are modifications of existent ones also not of my property.
